title: no XP?
body: Um, I just played a game, and won. Got my rewards for the first game of the day win and got 0 xp. Didnt level up,

replies.body: This is actually a bug. It just happened to me. The end of the game screen said that I received 0 XP. My history page said that I received XP, but this XP was not added to my total. I had to sign out, and sign in again and my total XP updated.

You won't be able to get XP if you are marked as a leaver for a match.  I can't pull up your account info right now, but this may be the case for your specific issue.  I'm not sure if it's intended, but it looks like you still got credit for the mission because your team won.
